It circles the sky in search of prey and dives sharply to catch its target.
_____ is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two _____ are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other’s wings.

_____ flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by _____’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.
If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.
A _____ dives upon prey from far above. It never misses its targets. It takes to the skies in search of lands with a warm climate.
